name: Bitzen
description: Bitzen is a funny way to discover the fascinating universe of the blockchain.Learn about Real-world projects and receive crypto-currencies as reward. Bitzen Space is a sophisticated platform to explore the crypto space. People can generate passive income by using Bitzen App through participating “Learn & Earn” “Play to Earn” “Business to Earn” “Web 3.0 – Metaverse” & more programmes
